text: Our dedicated development teams work for clients.
Teams managed by the client, assisted by Axilsoft project manager/ team lead.
There is full control over the management of the team.
The team is integrated with the client team and functions as their extended part.
Team sizes can be increased or decreased with prior notice.
The model is beneficial for any engagement lasting more than three months.
Cost-effective with high success rate for tech companies.
title: Development Team
description: Our dedicated development teams work for clients. Teams managed by the client, assisted by Axilsoft project manager/ team lead.

text: The project starts by deciding the fixed agreed-upon scope and price.
It critical to have the detailed requirements of the project at the start.
The engagement is usually time-boxed and hence accommodation of major change to the project is not straightforward.
This is applicable for small sized companies and very well-defined projects or prototyping.
title: Fixed Price Model
description: Our dedicated development teams work for clients. Teams managed by the client, assisted by Axilsoft project manager/ team lead.

text: Service fulfillment is managed by Axilsoft team.
Axilsoft team decides on the time and resources based on requirements for project completion.
Team members may or may not be dedicated to the project.
The engagement is not time-boxed hence extensive detailed scoping of requirements is not needed before starting.
This model is good for non-tech companies that lack the means to manage an offsite team.
It may get be a bit costlier in comparison to the dedicated team model.
Project success depends on how well the expectations are conveyed to the tech team
title: Managed Services
description: Our dedicated development teams work for clients. Teams managed by the client, assisted by Axilsoft project manager/ team lead.
